title: Riot *YOUR STORE* Scam
body:
[Screenshot of Fake Discounts. Shows how it ups the price of them and takes off the cost.](https://imgur.com/a/P2y1h)

[Screenshot of skin Prices in LoL Store](https://imgur.com/a/KFFPj)

Lying About Taking off 40% and 50%
You can clearly see in the first screenshot, it shows Project Lucian apparently costs 2325 RP, but in store he only costs 1350
This is a scam and it encourages people to buy the skin to think they are lucky, but it still costs an extra 45RP which isnt a discount.

Same with WoadKing Darius, is worth 975 in store and they increase it to 1855RP

Don't fall for this scam.
If anything i atleast would like a new shop fix.

PLEASE UPVOTE SO RIOT SPOTS THIS
